0.name: The continue instruction interrupts the entire loop when a certain condition occurs

1.name: The continue instruction interrupts the current loop iteration when a certain condition is met

2.name: The continue instruction executes the loop only once

3.name: The continue instruction will continue the loop regardless of any conditions

3.name: What are the continue and break instructions used for?

0.name: These instructions allow you to break the loop and skip iteration at a certain point

1.name: These instructions allow you to skip certain iterations of the loop

2.name: These instructions allow you to control loops and output only certain results

3.name: The continue and break directives are used only in infinite loops

5.name: Continue and break can be used in one loop
